ipsix.name: IPv6
ipsix.desc: You should be given at least 1 IPv6 by default.

virtulization.name: Virtulization
virtulization.desc: Most hosts will use either KVM, Xen or OpenVZ.

port_speed.name: Port Speed
port_speed.desc: The claimed speed of the port (should be at least 100Mbps).

gb_price.name: Price per GB of RAM
gb_price.desc: The price per GB of RAM in euros.

tb_price.name: Price per TB of storage
tb_price.desc: The price per TB of storage in euros.

points.name: Relative Points
points.desc: All supported and partially supported features in this table added up where partial support only gives half a point.

points_absolute.name: Absolute Points
points_absolute.desc: All supported and partially supported features of this solution added up where partial support only gives half a point.
